name: Better Bing
description: Bing's logo is a monstrosity, and the rest of its UI could do with a trim. This is a work in progress, whipped up in about 20 minutes after seeing one too many Bing ads on Hulu :)
additional_info: v1.0 - This could probably do with some edits, and it's definitely a bit of a hack-job, so adjust to taste as needed. Also, this pulls in typefaces used on the new microsoft.com homepage, but that may not work forever. Tested on the Stylish extension for Safari (https://github.com/350d/stylish) plus Chrome and Firefox.
